Widgets - all widgets¶

  • Gesture widget - capture and signal every gesture
  • Inner window - a way to embedded application into another
  • Kinetic - add kinetic to widget
  • Layout - horizontal, vertical layout arrangment
  • Multi slider - combine multiple slider easily
  • Radial - a radial widget
  • Simulator - implementation of multitouch with mouse
  • UI - core widgets
  • Video - video player widget
  • Virtual keyboard - a on-screen keyboard

Window - generic multitouch window
